articles.author: Suman Varandani
articles.title: Tiffany Eichler, Ex-Teacher Who Had Sex With Students, Gets 30-Day Jail Term
articles.description: A high school teacher in Canton, Ohio, was sentenced to 30 days in prison Tuesday after being accused of having sex with her students. Identified as Tiffany Eichler, 36, the woman pleaded guilty to three counts of sexual battery in May. Along with the 30 daysâ€¦
